Instance Property# exceptionReason

```
var exceptionReason: MXCrashDiagnosticObjectiveCExceptionReason? { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/MetricKit/MXCrashDiagnostic/exceptionReason#see-also)

### [Viewing exception details](/documentation/MetricKit/MXCrashDiagnostic/exceptionReason#Viewing-exception-details)

[`var exceptionType: NSNumber?`](/documentation/metrickit/mxcrashdiagnostic/exceptiontype)The Mach exception type of the crash.[`var exceptionCode: NSNumber?`](/documentation/metrickit/mxcrashdiagnostic/exceptioncode)The encoded processor-specific information for the crash.[`var signal: NSNumber?`](/documentation/metrickit/mxcrashdiagnostic/signal)The signal associated with the crash.[`var terminationReason: String?`](/documentation/metrickit/mxcrashdiagnostic/terminationreason)The reason the app was terminated as a human-readable string.[`var virtualMemoryRegionInfo: String?`](/documentation/metrickit/mxcrashdiagnostic/virtualmemoryregioninfo)Information about the region of memory an app accessed incorrectly, resulting in a bad-access crash.
